insert into ac_bank (member_id, account_source, bank_area_code, bank_name_code, bank_name, bank_no, bank_status, bind_time, card_type, is_def, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remarks, del_flag) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bankAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNameCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bindTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDef,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})
